Document.description: Document defines a document which will be transformed in the form os source and target.

force.description: Force defines whether the document should be overwritten if it already exists.

raw.description: Defines whether the document should be processed by the template engine or not.

source.description: Source defines the source file name, relative to the templates folder. If only the source is given, the target will be the same as the source.

target.description: Target defines the document target path relative to the output folder

Feature.description: Feature defines a section in a template which can be enabled.

name.description: Name of the feature. This is used to enable/disable the feature on the command line. All features are enabled by default. Features must be lowercase and start with a letter, they can contain letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores.

path.description: Path defines the path where the documents will be written to. It is a template which can be evaluated in the given context.

requires.description: Requires defines a list of features which must be run before this feature can be used.

items.description: Name of the feature which must be run before this feature can be used.

scopes.description: Scopes defines a list of scopes which will be applied to the documents.

Scope.description: Scope defines a set of documents which will be transformed.

documents.description: List of documents which will be transformed.

match.description: Match defines the context where this scope is applied to.

prefix.description: Prefix defines the prefix for all document targets.

description:
Rules engine to drive the object api generator
A typical setup looks like this:
```
schema: apigear.rules/1.0
name: simple cpp template
features:
  - name: api
    path: {{dot .Module.Name}}/
    scopes:
      - match: module
        documents:
          - source: api.h
            target: api.h

  - name: core
    requires: [api]
    path: {{dot .Module.Name}}/
    scopes:
      - match: module
        documents:
          - source: core.h
          - target: core.h
          - source: core.cpp
            target: core.cpp
  - name: init
    requires: [core]
    path: {{dot .Module.Name}}/
    scopes:
      - name: module
        documents:
          - source: Makefile
          - source: service.h
            target: {{snake .Interface.Name}}.h
          - source: service.cpp
            target: {{snake .Interface.Name}}.cpp
```

features.description: Features define a set of factory sections which can be enabled/disabled on the command line. typically it should contain api, core and init.

name.description: The name of the rules engine.

schema.description: The ApiGear Blueprint Rules specification version of this document.

version.description: The version of the rules document. Should be a major and minor and an optional patch version, separated by a dot (e.g. 0.1 or 0.1.0).

title: ObjectAPI rules engine
